title: Andrew Zimmern's Field to Fire
overview: In Field to Fire, lifelong outdoorsman and chef Andrew Zimmern heads back into the field to source his favorite proteins. From wild pigs in South Carolina to redhead duck in Texas, culinary icon Andrew Zimmern is geared up to hunt, fish, and harvest everything our country has to offer. After the catch, Andrew will demystify cooking wild food over an open fire while sharing tips for creating the ultimate wild game meal.
